name: Nut Bread
author: Dale Schlosser

ingredients.name: c. half black walnuts and pecans
c. Gold Medal flour *Do not use self rising flour

instructions: Heat oven to 350Â°. Grease 9 x 5 x 3 inch loaf pan. Combine bak- ing mix, sugar, flour, egg and milk. Beat vigorously for 30 seconds. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake for 1 hour or until done.
